document_data.name: Mutamin
document_data.mainbody: '''Mutamin''' was a [[gnome]] [[wizard|mage]], possibly mad, who resided in an area known as [[Mutamin's Garden]] north of the [[halfling]] village of [[Gullykin]].
document_data.Possessions: Mutamin wore an [[enchanted]] ''[[adventurer's robe]]'' and was armed with a plain [[quarterstaff]]. He usually kept two ''[[potions of healing]]'', a [[scroll]] of ''[[horror]]'' and a scroll of ''[[stinking cloud]]'' handy.
document_data.Activities: The gnome had trained the local [[basilisk]] population to attack and petrify wandering humanoids, but not to eat them, as Mutamin wanted to keep the statues of their victims as "art".
document_data.History: Mutamin was said to have died in [[1368 DR]] at the hands of adventurers.
